item.title: psfla.net is UP-TO-DATE!! - 5/10/25
item.description:
finally, people will be able to view what i have been doing for the past week!!!

yeah. finally got the 11ty version of this site to the point where i feel like i can call it the "main version" of this site!
you can find the php version here, but it won't be updated anymore.

like most rewrites of sites i create, this rewrite was made because the backend of php PSFLA was a mess. now, the backend is less of a mess!
it's still a mess though. you can check out the source here, if you're so inclined

i'm hopefully planning to update this site more, as well! fixing the quickprompt not displaying in firefox-based browsers should help with getting prompts, but i plan to write my own prompts if nobody responds for long enough. more promo across the indieweb might also help with getting prompts, but that's just something i'll have to keep in mind :p

- jade

back?
item.dc:creator: jade floase

item.title: blog finished! - 5/8/25
item.description:
hi! welcome to the first REAL blogpost on this site
i'm remaking PSFLA with 11ty! this is due to the previous php version being a mess to manage.
this will also make it compatable with nekoweb's hosting options... i already use nekoweb for hosting my personal site, and my supporter tier includes hosting multiple sites!

this site is not yet finished, however... i still have to finish the javascript portion of my mspa reader, so that it runs about as fast as mspfa's. until that point, the php version of PSFLA will still be present on the psfla.net domain, and the 11ty version will be hosted on psfla.nekoweb.org

pst. if you're seeing this, that means you're looking at the 11ty version!

- jade

back?
item.dc:creator: jade floase
